data.name: Iratus: Lord of the Dead - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The entire „Iratus: Lord of the Dead“ soundtrack. Gloomy, foreboding and evocative: Feel like the vexed necromancer Iratus himself while listening to the game’s epic soundtrack!
